data.description:
**New weapon update: FN SCAR-H battle rifle!**

Welcome to shooting in **120 fps** at our target-rich farm! This fun sandbox range gives you more than **30 weapons** and various targets. Blast and fight with accurate ballistics and weapon mechanics!

{1084690026324471}

**Assault rifles** (full auto): M4 - AK-47 - L85a3 - G36C

**Support**: M249 SAW LMG - M203 40mm under-barrel - M67 Hand grenade - M18 Smoke grenade

**Submachineguns** (full auto): FN P90 - MAC-10 - MP5A3 - MP5SD - Thompson M1928A1

**Rifles**: AR-15 - Dragunov - Barrett M107 .50-cal - M24 bolt action - CZ .22LR - AWM .300

**Shotguns**: SPAS-12 - Benelli M4 - Mossberg S/S - Beretta O/U - "Mad Max" - Sawn-off pump - AA12 (full auto)

**Handguns**: M1911 - Glock 17 - Desert Eagle - Beretta M9 - Glock 44 - Colt Python (6- and 2.5-inch) - S&W TRR8

**Optics, scopes, bipods, lasers and suppressors** can be fitted, and firing modes selected.

Short and long ranges with:
- scarecrows that hunt you,
- an item spawner,
- plinking, spinning, and destructible targets,
- scoring targets, moving or stationary,
  (bullseye, IPSC, silhouette targets)
- clays, trap, and skeet,
- chickens, hogs & a truck,
- a pumpkin launcher,
- a ShootBarn - clear the corridors,
- a 3-gun range,
and more!

https://discord.gg/r3JYKWMYME

gunsgame-1@yahoo.com

reddit.com/r/gunsgame

Accurate ballistics/loading. 120 Hz on Quest 2/3 if enabled! Install size around 140MB.

Free demo to try  - GUNSdemo!

changelog.change_log:
V. 0.932:

New weapons:
- Smith&Wesson TRR8 revolver, .357 Magnum
- Colt Python 2.5in snubnose revolver, .357 Magnum

=====

- Bug fix: body collider glitch.

V. 0.916: July 4th update!

New weapons: 
- AWM sniper rifle, .300 Win Magnum! 
- Also M18 smoke grenades & T2 optics on more handguns!
===
Fixes: Scarecrow aiming, barn door, pistol mag drop oddities.

V. 0.887: Assault rifle update!
- New weapon: H&K G36C assault rifle, 5.56!
- Test: T2 red dot on Desert Eagle
===
Bug fixes: Teleport bug fixed (at last!), pot shard shaking bug.

Update V. 0.865:

- New weapon: .22lr plinking rifle,
- New item spawner,

Bug fix for optics not appearing correctly on ungrabbed handguns.

Bug fix update:

- Hogs are now mortal again - a bug stopped them being hit correctly,
- The bullet link on the M249 could be duplicated and hang weirdly in certain circumstances, now fixed.

Previous update:
SAW update for GUNS: the M249 LMG!

- New weapon: the M249 5.56x45 Light Machine Gun,
- New machine gun targets,
- New hIt indicators.


=====

Known issues: teleporting may sometimes require two button presses.

SAW update for GUNS: the **M249 LMG**!

- New weapon: the **M249 5.56x45** Light Machine Gun,
- New **machine gun targets**,
- New **hIt indicators**.


=====

Known issues: teleporting may sometimes require two button presses.

Update 0.816: Handles & gunsmoke!

- New attachment type: handles!
- Also: gunsmoke effects, 
- model tweaks, 
- fps improvements!

V. 0.800:

- New SMG: the FN Herstal P90, 5.7x28!

- New burst/semi/auto fire mode - click right joystick for auto weapons to switch!

- New moveable stocks for M4, AR-15, Benelli, and SPAS.

- Snap turn setting moved to farmhouse settings board.

+++

- Pump shotgun spawn bug fixed.
V. 0786: Bug fix - Fixes for shotgun ammo bug and gun respawn bugs!

V. 0,784:
New weapons: 3 shotguns!
- Mossberg Side-by-side 12G,
- Beretta Over-under 12G,
- "Mad Max" sawn-off side-by side 12G.

New attachment: shotgun chokes!
+++++
Bug fixes and framerate improvements,
Better secondary grip function,
Better clay pigeons,
Clay pigeon launch by trigger touch option,
Support for ForceTube force feedback hardware.

V. 0.756:

New SMG: the Thompson M1928A1 .45ACP!

New attachment: bipods for rifles! Grab with secondary hand to activate "stick-to-surface".

Also: Performance tweaks to improve frame rates, some bug fixes.

V. 0.742:
Some bug fixes + moved the AA12 to the tables!

V. 0.740:
December update: Hogs & lasers! Also a holiday surprise!

- New attachments: laser modules.
- New farm animal: hogs!
- New suppressors for assault and sniper rifles.
- A surprise for Christmas!

+++

- Grenades will now detonate if shot with a rifle,
- Open bolt system operational fixes,
- Graphical glitches fixed.

V. 0.715:
New weapons: 2 submachine guns! 

- MAC-10 .45ACP machine pistol, famously described by a police official as "fit only for combat in a phone booth",
- Heckler & Koch MP5A3 9mm submachine gun, of SWAT and SF fame, 
- Also the H&K MP5SD variant with integrated "Schalld√§mpfer" suppressor.

+++

- Bug and graphic fixes,
- Full auto sounds reworked.

V. 0.694:
In this small Halloween update:
A pumpkin launcher,
Bug fixes for the hand grenades - handle now pops correctly after hand switch, and ammo text is correct.

V. 0.686:
New weapon - M67 hand grenade!
Suppressors can now be fitted to semi-auto handguns.
Live round ejection now works properly.
Bug fix: Desert Eagle sight line corrected.

V. 0.668: 
- New weapon: Colt Python 6-inch revolver! 
- New plate targets, 
- Tables will now remember the last selected gun, 
- Handgun slides now lock back properly.
- Bug fix: the ShootBarn could previously be launched with multiple scarecrow copies.

V. 0.632: New weapons and a new attachment system! 
- L85a3 full auto assault rifle, 
- M203 40mm under-barrel attachment for M4, AR-15, L85a3, 
- New grenade damage model,
- Grab position tweaks,
- Bug fixes.
Known issues:
- Turning attachment on or off may change the off-hand grab point a few cm. This will be fixed in the next release.

V. 0.607: New guns! 
- Barrett M107 (anti-material rifle, .50-cal), 
- Sawn-off shotgun (12-gauge)
Also some new damage effects and adjustments!
